description: Move forward a single entry in the browser"s history. The action will be completed when page ready state [complete] or until page loading timeout reached.

examples.description: Move forward a single entry in the browser"s history.
Move forward 2 entries in the browser"s history.

name: NavigateForward

properties.argument: The number of pages to navigate forward. Will trigger a [forward] call for each time, with a silent wait between intervals.

summary: Move forward a single entry in the browser"s history.
